product_name: Sherpa Adventure Gear Nyano Fleece Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Soft and lightweight, the women's Nyano Fleece Jacket from Sherpa Adventure Gear has something special: a seamline "wave" that flows along the arms, chest and back yoke. Polartec(R) Classic micro polyester fleece offers cozy warmth with light weight and dries fast. Handwarmer pockets and welded arm pocket all have zippers. Nyano Fleece Jacket for women from Sherpa Adventure Gear has contoured seams that refine and shape the fit. Closeout.
short_description: Soft and lightweight, the women's Nyano Fleece Jacket from Sherpa Adventure Gear has something special: a seamline "wave" that flows along the arms, chest and back yoke.
